General.Name: Sino-High (China) Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Sino-High (China) Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of aromatic ketone products in China and internationally. The company offers benzophenone series, acetophenone series, propiophenone, and other kinds of aromatic ketone products. Its products are used in special engineering plastics, light curing materials, cosmetics, medicine, pesticides, and other fields. The company also exports its products. Sino-High (China) Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.
